Summary: 2 - 3 brilliantly-white orbs/discs 30 - 45 degrees above the Eastern horizon 4:44AM - 5:00AM
trends: There have been 66 other sightings in South Kingstown
There was one other sighting in South Kingstown on or around July 12th 2012
divs: sighting detailsawoke at 4:44am to see 2 - 3 brilliantly white orbs\discs hovering 30 - 45 degrees above the eastern horizon (in virtually the same place i saw them 2 days ago). all 2 - 3 objects gradually moved away "in unison?" fading eastward over the next 15 minutes until they were no longer visible. i tried using binoculars, but they were not powerful enough to get a better view.
